properties.name: --ap-throttled-scale
properties.description: how many px units for each unscaled map unit. this value is throttled, so only use it for invisible elements like the tooltip hit test divs

properties.name: --ap-left-base
properties.description: x-component of the center of a landmark marker, relative to the unscaled map

properties.name: --ap-top-base
properties.description: y-component of the center of a landmark marker, relative to the unscaled map
